 3: namespace PulkitJalan\Google;
 4: 
 5: use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
 6: 
 7: class GoogleServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
 8: {
 9:     /**
10:      * Indicates if loading of the provider is deferred.
11:      *
12:      * @var bool
13:      */
14:     protected $defer = false;
15: 
16:     /**
17:      * Boot the service provider.
18:      */
19:     public function boot()
20:     {
21:         $this->app['PulkitJalan\Google\Client'] = function ($app) {
22:             return $app['google.api.client'];
23:         };
24:     }
25: 
26:     /**
27:      * Register the service provider.
28:      *
29:      * @return void
30:      */
31:     public function register()
32:     {
33:         $this->app->config->package('pulkitjalan/google-apiclient', realpath(__DIR__.'/config'), 'google');
34: 
35:         $this->app['google.api.client'] = $this->app->share(function () {
36:             return new Client($this->app->config->get('google::config'));
37:         });
38:     }
39: 
40:     /**
41:      * Get the services provided by the provider.
42:      *
43:      * @return string[]
44:      */
45:     public function provides()
46:     {
47:         return ['google.api.client', 'PulkitJalan\Google\Client'];
48:     }
49: }
